document.title: Wisconsin Standards for Essential Elements: Social Studies

7061EA6D38A94DF582B488AF60258E47.description: Initial Level: Wisconsin students will identify the intended audience and author’s point of view of a given primary source.

1E5C3B6DF00D4792914AC20003A8B05C.description:
Precursor Level: Wisconsin students will differentiate between primary and secondary sources and identify the intended audience,
purpose, and point of view (POV) of a given primary or secondary source.

73805B9EF8694E61808DD4B4221D1722.description:
Target Level: Wisconsin students will examine a variety of primary and secondary sources to identify the historical context, intended
audience, purpose, and/or author's point of view (Historical Methodology).

59044688CC064921A079F9957B7ED148.description:
Wisconsin students will examine a variety of primary and secondary sources to identify the historical context, intended
audience, purpose, and/or author's point of view (Historical Methodology).

EF60BD3E9E76447CA33199F3BDEAADC7.description:
Initial Level: Wisconsin students will explore historical people or events and identify how the person or event had an impact on their
own life.

5331132D35324AC4A162C99B29F819BF.description:
Precursor Level: Wisconsin students will identify different historical perspectives of a given event and identify an effect of a given
historical event on the lives of other people living in the present.

4D3A91869ABD469F8B6B7E095D242990.description:
Target Level: Wisconsin students will connect historical events, people, and ideas to the present, identify different perspectives, and
identify current implications.

A67FF7334A494D3C98D30E74D3DA4C56.description:
Wisconsin students will connect historical events, people, and ideas to the present, identify different perspectives, and
identify current implications.

6880704963EC4FBD90A059B1DD5802AA.description:
Initial Level: Wisconsin students will explore patterns of continuity and change over time and explore the context of a given historical
event.

FAA592B7BD9A48CB987695D6E3AF01A0.description:
Precursor Level: Wisconsin students will identify patterns of continuity and change over time and identify the context of a given
historical event.

62C9DBFF800C466E9E2207509F1850A4.description:
Target Level: Wisconsin students will recognize patterns of continuity and change over time and contextualization of historical
events.

D9B5F551EE084712A8719996E420525C.description:
Wisconsin students will recognize patterns of continuity and change over time, and contextualization of historical
events.

A4100545AEBF41B586D58649B8083371.description: Initial Level: Wisconsin students will identify a cause and effect for a given event.

29C11EF5FC364CCAB6DD100197048045.description: Precursor Level: Wisconsin students will explain a cause and effect for a given event.

DADA9C418C5F4C1DAB6965EF9AC7DFFF.description: Target Level: Wisconsin students will use historical evidence for determining cause and effect.

69F873DA1A06475BBACD574F5FF38E12.description: Wisconsin students will use historical evidence for determining cause and effect.
